item.title: Getting started with federal contracting
item.description: Government contracting can be daunting; here’s how to get started.

item.title: Things won't get bad. They'll get worse.
item.description: Readers of this blog are almost certainly conversant on the concept of biosecurity as it relates to protection from, and response to, large-scale use of chemical and biological entities as agents of warfare and terrorism. Billions of dollars and decades of effort have gone into creating countermeasures against a literal handful of the top-priority agents (anthrax, smallpox...the usual suspects). It's hard work, to be sure, and very expensive using today's methodologies and currently existing regulatory requirements. But are we safer?

item.title: Curiosity and the bottom line, plus grumpy cats and megabats
item.description: Tufts University: Pharma spends $4 to $6 billion each year on “procedures that generate extraneous clinical trial data.”

item.title: The latest on biodefense: Must-know resources
item.description: Where to find the latest on biodefense and emerging diseases, plus biotech news and events

item.title: Have you met SAM? Government contractors take note.
item.description: September 2012 DynPort newsletter, including an overview of the new consolidated federal procurement system SAM, plus biotech news and events.

item.title: Bacteria have been spending millions of years trying to kill us
item.description: August 2012 DynPort newsletter, including why biodefense is more important than ever, plus science news and events, and summer reading.

item.title: Bioerrorism
item.description: Like many of you, I watched with a mixture of interest, gallows humor and incredulity the furor over the past six months or so regarding the publication of the papers detailing how two different research teams figured out how to coax H5N1 influenza into fulfilling its potential to be a serious pandemic pathogen. ...

item.title: Providing an inspection-ready database to the FDA
item.description: DynPort's biotech and government contracting newsletter for June 2012 features a clinical quality assurance presentation, plus biotech news, resources and events.

item.title: Earned value management for life sciences
item.description: DynPort's business of biotech video series continues, with EVMS explained, plus biodefense and government contracting news and 25 events.
